title: GE wins funding for research into 3D printing of wind turbine blades
lead: It will develop and demonstrate an integrated additive manufacturing process for novel high-performance blade designs for the future of large rotors

title: 4 things most people don’t know about their energy contract
lead: The last 12 months have been turbulent. Many organisations have faced unprecedented uncertainty, with a return to business as usual still out of sight.

title: EV charging points to be rolled out in Mumbai railway stations
lead: Central Railway, Mumbai, has partnered with the UN Environment Programme and Tata Power to promote electric mobility in the city

title: Elon Musk unveils details for $100m carbon removal competition
lead: The four-year competition invites people to create carbon capture solutions that can scale to gigatonne level

title: Green gusts of wind atop Empire State
lead: 10.1 million-square-foot portfolio of the Empire State’s owner now powered by wind energy

lead: The facility aims to make it easier for hydrogen cars and trucks to refuel

lead: The project is predicted to be seven times larger than Hornsea 1

lead: Windfarms will occupy sea footprint the size of London and power 3.4 million homes

title: Equinor strikes oil and gas near Troll field in the North Sea
lead: Recoverable resources are estimated at between seven and 11 million standard cubic metres of oil equivalent
